extensionDescription.message: Manage form history entries (search, view, edit, cleanup, export/import) and easy formfiller.

fieldName.description: The label for the formfield-name of a formfield entry.

fieldValue.description: The label for the value/content of a formfield entry.

fieldType.description: The label for the type of a formfield entry.

fieldCount.description: The label for the number of times a formfield entry has been used.

fieldFirstUsed.description: The label for the date a formfield entry was first used.

fieldLastUsed.description: The label for the date a formfield entry was last used.

fieldAge.description: The label for the age of a formfield entry since it was last used.

fieldHost.description: The label for the host where the formfield entry was used.

pagingAll.description: For the paging list, indicates All values displayed in one single page.

operationWindowTile.description: Window title of the formfield edit window.

operationViewField.description: Edit a single field, info displayed in edit window.

operationEditOneField.description: Edit a single field, info displayed in edit window.

operationEditMultipleFields.description: Edit multiple fields at once, info displayed in edit window.

operationAddField.description: Add a new field, info displayed in edit window.

labelPreview.description: Label for the checkbox which toggles the HTML preview window.

menuItemText2Clipboard.description: Contextmenu item: Copy only clean text to clipboard.

menuItemHtml2Clipboard.description: Contextmenu item: Copy entire HTML to clipboard.

dialogErrorTitleDatabase.description: Title of error dialog for database access errors.

databaseError.message: Database access has been blocked ($ERROR$). This application requires cookie permissions, please check the Privacy and Security preferences of the browser
databaseError.description: Error displayed when the database is not accessible

timeoutTooMuchDataWarning.message:
There is too much data to quickly display in a popup window, use the cleanup option in order to reduce the amount of data or open the advanced 'Manage History' window (right mouseclick).

($count$ results of total $total$ discarded)
timeoutTooMuchDataWarning.description: Warning displayed when there is too much data to display within a reasonable amount of time.

informClipboardValueCopied.message: Value successfully copied to the clipboard
informClipboardValueCopied.description: Information message that clipboard value has been copied.

confirmStartCleanupTitle.description: Title of confirmation dialog asking confirmation for cleaning up immediately.

confirmStartCleanupMessage.message:
Start cleanup and remove formhistory not used in the past $nrofdays$ days?

(Age can be adjusted in preferences)
confirmStartCleanupMessage.description: Message asking confirmation for for cleaning up immediately (see also key: optionsremovedays).

informCleanupInitiated.message: Cleanup has been started, formhistory not used in the past $nrofdays$ days is being removed.
informCleanupInitiated.description: Information message that cleanup has been initiated (see also key: optionsremovedays).

confirmDeleteMultipleTitle.description: Title of confirmation dialog asking confirmation for deleting multiple selected item.

confirmDeleteMultipleMessage.message: Multiple items have been selected, delete ALL selected items?
confirmDeleteMultipleMessage.description: Message asking confirmation for deleting multiple selected item.

validationErrorMissingRequired.message: Not all required fields are populated
validationErrorMissingRequired.description: Validation message for missing mandatory values.

validationErrorLastBeforeFirst.message: The 'Last used' date should be equal to or after the 'First used' date.
validationErrorLastBeforeFirst.description: Validation message for last date being before first date.

validationErrorAtLastOneField.message: At least one field must have a value.
validationErrorAtLastOneField.description: Validation message for no fields having a value.

validationErrorNotNumeric.description: Validation message for value not being a numeric value.

validationErrorInvalidURL.message: Value is not a valid URL.
validationErrorInvalidURL.description: Validation message for value not being a valid URL.

importErrorTitle.description: Title of modal error dialog for import errors.

importErrorNotXml.message: Not an xml file, import aborted.
importErrorNotXml.description: Error message when trying to import a file which is not XML.

importErrorNotFound.description: Error message when import file is not found.

importErrorNotReadable.description: Error message when import file is not readable.

importErrorUnknown.message: An error occurred reading the import file.
importErrorUnknown.description: Error message when an error occurred reading the import file.

importErrorCancelled.description: Error message when reading import file was cancelled.

tooltipEraseDatetimeButton.description: Tooltip for the erase button: erase date and time

tooltipNowDatetimeButton.message: Set the current date and time
tooltipNowDatetimeButton.description: Tooltip for the time button: set the current date and time

exportNoOfTextEntries.description: Import/Export window: Number of text entries.

exportNoOfdMultilineEntries.description: Import/Export window: Number of multiline entries.

exportDownloadLinkInfo.message: Click on the download link to open or save the export file.
exportDownloadLinkInfo.description: Short explanation in the export dialog: click download link to open or save locally

optionDefault.description: The 'default' option in a select list.

optionAutomatic.description: The 'automatic' option in a select list.

optionsDomainlistMenu.description: Options window: Left Domain Filter menu.

optionsFieldlistMenu.description: Options window: Left Field Filter menu.

optionsThemeSelect.description: Options window: The theme selection dropdown label

optionsDateformatSelect.description: Options window: The date format selection dropdown label

optionsOverrideAutocomplete.description: Options window: The Override autocomplete checkbox Label.

optionsShortcutsLegend.description: Options window: The Shortcut key combinations legend.

optionsShortcutsMainDialog.description: Options window: Shortcut-keys label opening FHC main dialog, additional text to distinguish from small

optionsShortcutsSmallDialog.description: Options window: Shortcut-keys label opening FHC main dialog, additional text to distinguish from small

optionsShortcutsUpdateNotSupported.message: Updating shortcuts is not (yet) supported by the browser!
optionsShortcutsUpdateNotSupported.description: Options window: Message displayed when updating Shortcut-keys is not (yet) supported by the browser.

optionsSaveNewVersionMultiline.message: Save a new version of a multiline field when:
optionsSaveNewVersionMultiline.description: Options window, sub heading: Save a new version of a multiline field when:.

optionsSaveNewVersionMultilineAge.message: last saved version is older than:
optionsSaveNewVersionMultilineAge.description: Options window, label before select list with time options: last saved version is older than:.

optionsSaveNewVersionMultilineCount.message: or content length changes more than:
optionsSaveNewVersionMultilineCount.description: Options window label before select list with no of characters: or content length changes more than:.

optionsSaveNewVersionMultilineCharacters.description: Options window, content length select-options list: The 'characters' text preceded by the number.

optionsRetainFieldTypes.description: Options window, Retain which type of field

optiondomainlistlegend.description: Options window: The Domain Filter legend.

optionsradiodomainall.description: Options window, domainfilter: Label for Allow All radiobutton.

optionsradiodomainblacklist.description: Options window, domainfilter: Label for Blacklist radiobutton.

optionsradiodomainwhitelist.description: Options window, domainfilter: Label for Whitelist radiobutton.

optionsautocleanup.description: Options window, cleanup: Label for auto cleanup checkbox.

optionsremovedays.message: Remove formhistory not used in the past
optionsremovedays.description: Options window, cleanup: Label before no of days input.

optionsremovedaysdays.description: Options window, cleanup: Label after no of days input.

buttoncleanupnow.description: Options window, cleanup: Label of the cleanup-now button.

popupHeader.description: Header title of the small popup.

popupHeaderInfo.message: showing history for this page only
popupHeaderInfo.description: Extra info next to the header title of the small popup.

open_preference_tooltip.description: Tooltip for icon displayed in dialog which opens the preferences dialog.

open_bigdialog_tooltip.description: Tooltip for icon displayed in dialog which opens the main 'Manage History' dialog.

contextMenuItemManageHistory.description: Title of context menu item that starts the Manage history dialog.

contextMenuItemRestoreEditorField.description: Title of context menu item that displays the editor (wysiwyg) field values.

contextMenuItemRestoreEditorFieldSubmenu.description: Submenu-item header of ontext-menu 'Restore Edit field' indicating hostname matches.
Submenu-item header of ontext-menu 'Restore Edit field' indicating most recent matches.
Last Submenu-item in ontext-menu 'Restore Edit field' indicating more items.

contextMenuItemFillMostRecent.message: Fill fields with most recent entries
contextMenuItemFillMostRecent.description: Title of context menu item that fills formfields with the most recent used value.

contextMenuItemFillMostUsed.message: Fill fields with most often used entries
contextMenuItemFillMostUsed.description: Title of context menu item that fills formfields with the most used value.

contextMenuItemClearFields.description: Title of context menu item that clears all filled fields.

contextMenuItemShowformfields.message: Show fields on the current page
contextMenuItemShowformfields.description: Title of context menu item that shows info next to input textfields om the page.

contextMenuItemOptions.description: Title of context menu item that shows the preferences page.

menuItemFileImport.description: Label of Import menuitem in the File menu.

menuItemFileExport.description: Label of Export menuitem in the File menu.

menuItemFileClose.description: Label of Close menuitem in the File menu.

menuItemEditAdd.description: Label of Add menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemEditModify.description: Label of Modify menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemEditDelete.description: Label of Delete menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemEditClipboard.description: Label of Copy to clipboard menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemEditSelectAll.description: Label of Select all menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemEditSelectNone.description: Label of Select none menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemEditSelectInvert.description: Label of Invert selection menuitem in the Edit menu.

menuItemDisplayRefresh.description: Label of Refresh menuitem in the Display menu.

menuItemExtraPreferences.description: Label of Preferences menuitem in the Extra menu.

menuItemExtraCleanupNow.description: Label of cleanup-now menuitem in the Extra menu.

menuItemInfoSubmenu.description: Label of Info submenu in the context menu.

menuItemHelpOverview.description: Label of Help menuitem in the Help menu.

menuItemHelpReleasenotes.description: Label of Releasenotes menuitem in the Help menu.

menuItemHelpAbout.description: Label of About menuitem in the Help menu.

paMenuItemAddBlacklist.description: Label pageaction menuitem: Blacklist current page

paMenuItemDeleteBlacklist.message: Remove current page from the blacklist
paMenuItemDeleteBlacklist.description: Label pageaction menuitem: Remove current page from the blacklist.

paMenuItemAddWhitelist.description: Label pageaction menuitem: Whitelist current page.

paMenuItemDeleteWhitelist.message: Remove current page from the whitelist
paMenuItemDeleteWhitelist.description: Label pageaction menuitem: Remove current page from the whitelist.

loading_status.description: Text displayed while data is being loaded.
